location: No. 255, Lane 2, Jingmao Road, Nangang District, near Nangang Software Park MRT Station (242m), near Lalaport
notes: Modern furnished apartment in elevator building near Nangang Software Park MRT, 1BR/2LR/2BA with 29.74 ping total (16.85 ping interior). Comes with full furnishings, appliances, two balconies, and a parking space. Good for a couple with baby: elevator access, modern condition, convenient location near Lalaport shopping; however, two balconies need safety checks for railing gaps, no pets allowed, and the interior usable space (16.85 ping / ~55 sqm) is smaller than the total listed area suggests. Minimum 1-year lease, 2-month deposit, agent service fee applies.
